root.name: Disney Golf
root.description: Disney Golf features famous Disney characters, such as Mickey Mouse, Goofy, Pete, and Donald Duck, playing golf across six 3D courses and using over 60 magical power-ups to improve their shots. At the time of release, it was the fifth golf game to be created for the PlayStation 2.CoursesThe six courses available in Disney Golf include American, Western, Mountain, Tropical, European, and a special Sky course set among the clouds. The first four are available from the start, but the European and Sky courses must be unlocked by playing the one-player challenge mode.Selectable CharactersThere are eight selectable characters, but only four available at the beginning of Disney Golf. The remainder must be unlocked. Eventually, one can decide to play as Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Goofy, Max, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Pete, or Professor Ludwig Von Drake. Characters are placed into one of four categories: Normal, Power, Technique, and Kids; the last offering is designed to be played with a simplified control system for younger players.

similar_games.game: Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds
